text: Pula (Pùla) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Cagliari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 7,360 people lived there. Its area is 138.92 km². It is 15 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Communes of the Metropolitan City of Cagliari
title: Pula, Sardinia
